history.text: Hello
Tell me about the movie!
Hello, so what do you think about the movie The Avengers? Did you like it?
No I haven't. I'm curious as to what it is.
Its about a group of superheroes that join to fight a common evil. It has characters such as Iron Man, Hulk, Thor in it.
Oh wow
I've seen some of those heroes before.

So they teamed up to make one movie or fight one super strong
 bad guy or something?
Yeah, they team up to fight Thor's evil brother and other villains. Its a really cool movie with great special effects, you should really watch it.
yeah I'll definitely check it out
Although there seems to be so many super hero movies now...
Yeah, it also has a lot of comedy in it so it doesnt get boring, I have watched it like 4 times and it doesnt get old.
How do I know which one to watch? Or is the super hero movie like this one the best one to watch because they're all in it.
You should watch Iron Man 1 and 2 first and also first Thor movie to understand the plot better.
Oh okay, so there definitely is some plot that connects between the super hero world across the movies.
The effects are great and also the music tracks, AC/DC ischaracteristic of IronMan movies.
Yeah, theres definetely a connection
Thats pretty cool actually, like one giant plot almost

Yeah, theres also a bunch of new super heroes such as Spiderman, Antman, Dr. Strange, Black Panther
 that will appear in the second movie.
It has a really interesting plot,
whoa I haven't even heard of half of those. are they powerful like superman and ironman?
Yeah, almost as powerful but with different abilities, theres even a movie about each one of them as well.
All part of the Marvel comics universe of movies
thats awesome. I used to think all the universes in those movies/comics were their own existence.
I might have to give some of those movies another try. seems a lot more complex that I thought.
with everything intertwined and such. makes for some pretty good cross movie plot I imagine.
Yeah and its engaging because other superheroes appear in the other heroes movies.
Iron Man appears in almost all of them
and Robert Downey Jr just cracks me up
I like that, it honestly does get a little boring watching a super hero movie with only 1 hero and 1 villain
and yeah the actors are so great haha. robert is hilarious
It has pretty good actors as well such as Chris Hemsworth, Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson.
And the movie the Avengers has a 92% positive reviews rating
wow thats really well received. everyone must love the movie, because I know how critical some online reviewers are haha.
Yeah, most reviews are positive it also has a CinemaScore of A+ and thats a pretty good thing.
Tells you a lot about a movie

Yeah especially movies with a lot of green screens and special effects. For some reason people are SUPER critical about those movies and how their effects like explosions play out. more so than plot sometimes haha.
Yeah, sound effects tend to be overloaded, but this movie has great ratings and a great plot,
the only negative rating is of Metacritic Score with a 69/100
but I dont agree with that rating

uid1response.feedback: Very convincing. Never gave the genera much thought, but it seems like a nice change of pace from what I've been watching lately, so I'll give it a watch and take his suggestions.
